text:
="preserve">Giulia Maria Crespi (6 June 1923 – 19 July 2020) was an Italian media businesswoman. She was a non-profit executive and environmentalist. She was the founder of Fondo Ambiente Italiano. She became Knight Grand Cross of the Order of Merit of the Italian Republic. Crespi was born Merate, Italy.
Crespi died in Milan on 19 July 2020, aged 97.

annotations.surface_form: Knight Grand Cross of the Order of Merit
